entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
